history.narrative: Law 19-211, the “Technology Sector Enhancement Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-747. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Sept. 19, 2012, and Oct. 16, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Nov. 1, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-513 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-211 became effective on Mar. 5, 2013.
